title: New Gameplay Today – Mario Kart Live: Home Circuit
summary:
For many, this year has meant a lot of time at home finding new ways to entertain ourselves.
With Mario Kart Live: Home Circuit, Nintendo is hoping to quell some of that monotony with a new way to play the classic series.
Home Circuit allows you to control a real Mario RC car from your Nintendo Switch and race against your friends and AR opponents.
You set up custom racetracks and can even add physical hazards as you're free to create inventive courses using the included cardboard gates.
If you're a fan of the series and already have a Nintendo Switch (which you need to play the game), you don't have long to wait as Mario Kart Live: Home Circuit launches on October 16 for $100.
